Translations.Text: Kandi barakubaza kuvyerekeye imihango y’abakenyezi, babwire yuko uwo ari umwanda rero nimutandukane nabo bakenyezi mugihe bari mumihango yabo, kandi ntimubegere kugeza aho bazo kwisukurira, nibaheza kwisukura niho murekuriwe kubatumbera munzira Imana yabategetse gucamwo mu vy’ukuri Imana ikunda abasaba ikigongwe kandi igakunda n’abisukuye

Abakenyezi banyu kuri mwebwe nink’imirima yanyu, rero nimugendere iyo mirima yanyu nkuko mushaka, mugabo mutanguze imitima yanyu kandi mutinye Imana yanyu, kandi mumenye yuko muzohura n’Imana, kandi mubashikirize inkuru nziza y’abantu bemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri
Kandi ntimugire indahiro zanyu kw’izina ry’Imana kugira ngo ibe ariyo mpamvu y’ukuba zitira n’ugutinya Imana n’uguhuza hagati y’abantu, n’Imana niyo yumva kandi niyo ifise ubumenyi buhagije
Imana ntizobafata kubera indahiro zanyu ataco zimaze, ahubwo izobafata kuvyagizwe n’inguvu hamwe n’imitima yanyu, n’Imana niyo ifise ikigongwe cinshi kandi niyo ntungane cane
Ku bantu barahira yuko bazotandukana n’abakenyezi babo, n’ukurindira kugeza kukiringo c’amezi ane, hanyuma nibasubiza hamwe, bamenye yuko Imana ifise ikigongwe cinshi n’impuhwe zihagije
Nibafata ingingo z’ukwahukana Imana niyo yumva kandi niyo ifise ubumenyi buhagije

N’abakenyezi bahukanye kubanega babo, nibarindire kugeza aho bazo kwisukurira kumihango yabo y’amezi atatu arangiye, kandi ntibarekuriwe kunyegeza imbanyi zabo bafise zaremwe n’Imana ziri munda zabo niba bemera Imana yabo y’ukuri hamwe n’umusi w’imperuka, nabo batambukanyi babo barafise uburenga nzira bw’ukubacura muri ico kiringo niba bagomba kugiriranira imbabazi, nabo bakenyezi barafise uburenga nzira bw’amategeko y’Imana nk’uburenga nzira buri kuribo z’ukubagirira abatambukanyi babo, nabo banega babo barafise iteka ntangere kubasumba, n’Imana niyo nyene ubushobozi n’ubuhizi buhagije
